short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A place to take quick notes within the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pickle notes is an extension which allows users to take notes within the web browser.

Pickle Notes makes it quick and easy to take, read, and manage notes.

Please review and email any feedback to youthmolecule@gmail.com.
